name: @refinio/one-provider-runtime
description: Node.js IPC runtime for Apple File Provider

scripts.vendor:install: rm -rf node_modules/@refinio && mkdir -p node_modules/@refinio && cd node_modules/@refinio && tar -xzf ../../../vendor/refinio-one.core-*.tgz && mv package one.core && tar -xzf ../../../vendor/refinio-one.models-*.tgz && mv package one.models

comments.dependencies: Installed from vendor/ tarballs via npm run vendor:install
